statements: DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE id = 1 AND metric_name = 'latency';
DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE metric_name = 'throughput' AND value > 1000;
DELETE FROM historical_performance_data WHERE id = 1 AND category = 'Sales';
DELETE FROM trends_and_patterns WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND trend = 'Upwards Trend';
DELETE FROM PerformanceTrends WHERE trend_name = 'Sales Trend';
DELETE FROM PerformanceTrends WHERE trend_name = 'Sales' AND trend_description LIKE '%increase%';
DELETE FROM trends WHERE trend_name = 'Sales' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trends WHERE trend_id = 100 AND trend_name = 'Sales Trend';
